titleStmt.title: Richard J. Browne to James F. Robinson
CWG7689

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
House of Rep
5 Spep 1862
Hon J F Robinson
Dear Sir
I would most respectfully suggest Dr James R Hughes of Springfield Ky as a proper person to be appointed Commissioner of ^the^ Draft for Washington County. He is competent and loyal_

Yours most
Respectfully
Richd J. Browne
Rep from Wash. Co
